institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Continuing Employment Incentive Payment and Operation Rules/Article 5 (Payment Application)
contents: Article 5 (Application for Payment) The Chairman of the Board must receive the following documents from persons who wish to receive incentives pursuant to Article 19, Paragraph 1 of the Decree by July 31st of each year: 1. Continuing employment in Form No. 15 of the Enforcement Rules. Incentive payment application form, 2. 1 copy of employment or experience certificate in Annex 1, 2, and 3 of this rule Revised March 25, 2020, 3. 1 copy of personal information use consent form in Annex 4 of this rule, 4 Other documents required by the Chairman to be submitted.
